version: Which Python version do you wish to use for analysis? (default {default_version}):
encoding: Which encoding do you wish to use for reading the file? (default {default_encoding}):
docker_image_tag: Choose a tag for the Docker image:
project_path: Enter the path to your project (default is the current directory):
module_name: Enter the name of the main module for the project (if any):
entrypoint: Enter the path of the entrypoint file if any (default is 'entrypoint.sh'):
api_filename: Enter the name of the FastAPI generated file (default is 'app.py'):
server_app: Enter the server application name (default is 'gunicorn'):
wsgi_file_name: Enter the name of the WSGI file (default is 'wsgi.py'):
wsgi_conf_file_name: Enter the name of the WSGI configuration file (default is 'gunicorn.conf.py'):
host: Enter the host address for the server (default is '0.0.0.0'):
port: Enter the port number for the server (default is 5001):
workers: Enter the number of workers for the server (default is 2):
timeout: Enter the timeout for the server in seconds (default is 60):
